channel.title: A Mod Suggestion
channel.description:
Get a mod for the forum that, when you click on 'unread posts since last visit' you get only posts in expanded forums. You know how you can click on the box next to the name so you don't have to see such a useless forum? Well, I don't want to see the posts from that section ever.
Think there is such a thing?

item.title: A Mod Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Pwnd:

The Private servers’ll be on another sever/forum in a few. Mopar just has to situate it with his host(s).

its true, shouldnt be over another couple days from now ;D

Read full topic

item.title: A Mod Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:2, topic:9311”]yea. I always get stupid server advertisement up at the top of my unread posts every 10 minutes. This should be done.[/quote]That’s about 90% of the reason why this’d be an amazing mod, but the servers are being resituated, so meh. The Private servers’ll be on another sever/forum in a few. Mopar just has to situate it with his host(s).

Read full topic
